holidays.title: Butterscotch Cinnamon Pie Day

holidays.title: Honduras Independence Day
holidays.description: Christopher Columbus called the area ‘Golfo de Honduras’ — which means ‘The Gulf of the Depths.'

holidays.title: International Day of Democracy
holidays.description: When freedom is absent, life includes unimaginable challenges that are often incomprehensible.

holidays.title: International Dot Day
holidays.description: It started with a story about a little girl named Vashti, the protagonist of “The Dot.”

holidays.title: Make a Hat Day
holidays.description: We celebrate Make a Hat Day by making hats that suit us the best.

holidays.title: National Africa Civility Day

holidays.title: National Cheese Toast Day

holidays.title: National Custom Framing Day
holidays.description: Have you ever wondered how boring a painting or photograph would look without a frame?

holidays.title: National D.A.R.E. Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about preventing drug abuse and how you can help.

holidays.title: National Double Cheeseburger Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating one of America’s revered and most savored food items.

holidays.title: National Google.com Day
holidays.description: Do you know what day it is today? It's National Google.com Day! Let's celebrate together.

holidays.title: National Linguine Day
holidays.description: The pesto is blended, the shrimp is boiled. Time to add the most important ingredient — linguine.

holidays.title: National Malcolm Day
holidays.description: If your name is Malcolm, then today is your day, so let’s find out more about you!

holidays.title: National Online Learning Day
holidays.description: The internet has revolutionized the learning process and offers flexible learning environment to students.

holidays.title: National Pawpaw Day
holidays.description: It tastes like a cross between mango, banana, and sometimes other fruits.

holidays.description: Today is the day to celebrate Rubens around the world, so let’s find out more!

holidays.title: National Tackle Kids Cancer Day
holidays.description: National Tackle Kids Cancer Day is observed to raise critical funds for pediatric cancer research.

holidays.title: Shout of Dolores
holidays.description: ¡Viva Mexico! These are the words powerful enough to free a nation!

holidays.title: Wales International Film Festival
holidays.description: It is ‘on your marks, get set, go!’ As we join in the upcoming movie marathon.

holidays.description: Get those helmets on and let’s celebrate World Engineers Day right here!

holidays.title: Jenna Marbles’s Birthday
holidays.description: This humorous persona and incredible woman will be dearly missed on our screens.

holidays.description: This K-pop star has all the makings of a heartthrob, and his fan following is proof.

holidays.title: Lisa Vanderpump’s Birthday
holidays.description: Life isn't all diamonds and roses, but her life is one to be envious of.

holidays.title: Prince Harry’s Birthday
holidays.description: The glory of living lies not in never falling, but in rising, just like Prince Harry.

holidays.title: Sommer Ray’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her evolution as a stunning model and social media celebrity is one that everyone should emulate.
